properties.Name: LedgerAccountBalance
properties.Description: The ledger account balance as of the associated timestamp.

Columns.Name: LedgerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Ledger.

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the associated balance is current or effective as-of.

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountBalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The balance of the ledger account as of the associated timestamp.

Columns.Name: CreditBalanceIndicator
Columns.Description:
Indicates whether the account balance is a credit balance or debit balance.

A credit balance is an excess of credits over debits.

Columns.Name: DebitBalanceIndicator
Columns.Description:
Indicates whether the account balance is a credit balance or debit balance.

A debit balance is an excess of debits over credits.

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountBalanceTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account Balance Type.

Properties.Description: The ledger account balance as of the associated timestamp.
